title: Jobs Day, Labor, And Real Estate Investment
itunes:title: Jobs Day, Labor, And Real Estate Investment
description:
Dana Peterson, Chief Economist & Center Leader of Economy, Strategy, and Finance at The Conference Board, discusses the jobs report. Tom Gimbel, Founder & CEO of the LaSalle Network, talks about labor and the latest jobs numbers. Joanie Bily, Chief Workforce Analyst at EmployBridge, talks about employment amid inflation and the emergence of Omicron on jobs day. Aaron Jodka, National Director of Capital Markets Research at Colliers, discusses real estate investing in 2022. Hosted by Paul Sweeney and Taylor Riggs.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
